md:
giải nghĩa từ "endings" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. -ing (verb ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a continuous or ongoing action
	* Example: I am writing a letter. (Tôi đang viết một bức thư)
	* Related words: running, dancing, singing, reading
2. -ed (verb ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a completed action
	* Example: I walked to school. (Tôi đã đi bộ đến trường)
	* Related words: walked, ran, jumped, finished
3. -s (noun ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a plural noun
	* Example: I have three cats. (Tôi có ba con mèo)
	* Related words: dogs, houses, cars, books
4. -ly (adverb ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a manner or way of doing something
	* Example: She sings beautifully. (Cô ấy hát rất đẹp)
	* Related words: quickly, loudly, wisely, happily
5. -ment (noun ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a result or outcome
	* Example: The government's decision was a disappointment. (Quyết định của chính phủ là một sự thất vọng)
	* Related words: employment, development, improvement, movement
6. -tion (noun ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a process or action
	* Example: The education system needs reform. (Hệ thống giáo dục cần cải cách)
	* Related words: education, action, reaction, emotion
7. -al (adjective ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a quality or characteristic
	* Example: The hotel room was comfortable. (Phòng khách sạn là thoải mái)
	* Related words: national, rational, logical, musical
8. -ic (adjective ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a quality or characteristic
	* Example: The music was fantastic. (Âm nhạc là tuyệt vời)
	* Related words: graphic, logic, dynamic, historic
9. -ous (adjective ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a quality or characteristic
	* Example: The view from the top was tremendous. (Cảnh quan từ trên cao là tuyệt vời)
	* Related words: famous, generous, curious, furious
10. -ful (adjective ending)
	* Meaning: indicates a quality or characteristic
	* Example: The sunset was breathtaking. (Hoàng hôn là tuyệt vời)
	* Related words: hopeful, careful, thoughtful, grateful

Note: These are just some common examples of English suffixes and their meanings. There are many more suffixes and variations in English.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "endings" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. -ing (verb ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a continuous or ongoing action
    • Example: I am writing a letter. (Tôi đang viết một bức thư)
    • Related words: running, dancing, singing, reading
  2. -ed (verb ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a completed action
    • Example: I walked to school. (Tôi đã đi bộ đến trường)
    • Related words: walked, ran, jumped, finished
  3. -s (noun ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a plural noun
    • Example: I have three cats. (Tôi có ba con mèo)
    • Related words: dogs, houses, cars, books
  4. -ly (adverb ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a manner or way of doing something
    • Example: She sings beautifully. (Cô ấy hát rất đẹp)
    • Related words: quickly, loudly, wisely, happily
  5. -ment (noun ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a result or outcome
    • Example: The government's decision was a disappointment. (Quyết định của chính phủ là một sự thất vọng)
    • Related words: employment, development, improvement, movement
  6. -tion (noun ending)

    • Example: The education system needs reform. (Hệ thống giáo dục cần cải cách)
    • Related words: education, action, reaction, emotion

  9. -ous (adjective ending)

    • Related words: famous, generous, curious, furious
  10. -ful (adjective ending)
    • Meaning: indicates a quality or characteristic

    • Related words: hopeful, careful, thoughtful, grateful

Note: These are just some common examples of English suffixes and their meanings. There are many more suffixes and variations in English.
